name: Traveller (Emil Kuk)
description:
Traveller is a procedurally generated open world adventure game. Discover a beautifully crafted world and enjoy a relaxing journey! 

Plans for the future

Currently this game is in a very early stage of development, with only a few basic gameplay elements. I plan to add more features in the future, such as:

  • Rivers
  • Vehicles (Trains, Boats, Cars, Planes)
  • NPC
  • Quests
  • Skills
  • Save/Load system
  • Bigger and better-looking map generator
  • And more...
System requirements (Estimated)
  • Recommended (High, 1080p, 60 FPS)
    • GPU - GTX 1060
    • CPU - Intel i5 8gen
    • RAM - 8GB
    • Storage - 1GB
  • The best quality (Epic, 4K, 60 FPS)
    • GPU - RTX 3070
    • CPU - Intel i7 8gen
    • RAM - 8GB
    • Storage - 1GB
  • Low quality (Low, 1080p, 30 FPS)
    • GPU - GTX 750
    • CPU - Intel i5 6gen
    • RAM - 4GB
    • Storage - 1GB

Enjoy the game :)
